text: @AlecMacGillis Because Trump is fighting for his life on his re-election, nothing else matters to him.  He’s getting a vaccine in October to bribe the American voters, and he surely will because FDA will certainly oblige to help him.  That’s the only thing he will do towards the coronavirus.
